summary: Sends key sequence down and up in current window.

details.comment: Sends key sequence down and up in current window.
details.content:
import xdo
xdt = xdo.Xdo()
key = b"k"
window = xdo.CURRENTWINDOW
xdt.send_keysequence_window_down(window, key)
xdt.send_keysequence_window_up(window, key)
# it needs binary encoding.
